news.title: IT Corridor Urban Planning and Environmental Guidelines
news.content: Telangana High Court issues comprehensive guidelines for urban planning in IT corridors, emphasizing sustainable development, green building norms, and traffic management in tech hubs.

news.title: Agricultural Land Acquisition and Farmer Compensation
news.content: The court establishes fair compensation framework for agricultural land acquisition for industrial projects, ensuring adequate rehabilitation and livelihood protection for farmers.

news.title: Lake Restoration and Water Body Protection
news.content: Telangana High Court mandates comprehensive lake restoration programs in Hyderabad and surrounding areas, focusing on pollution control and ecological restoration.
